imgs.text: West Solent One-Design photo on sailboatdata.com

name: WEST SOLENT ONE-DESIGN
notes:
Originally called WEST SOLENT RESTRICTED CLASS.
In 1925 5 boats were built for export to Argentina where they became the LOS INDIOS CLASS.
The WEST SOLENT ONE-DESIGN raced as a class around the UK into the 1950's.
It is thought that at least 10 are still sailing. (2011)
